properties.body:
NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
S/V MAGRITTE SINKING IN 16-42.9N 027-24.1W AT 040400Z DEC.
FOUR PERSONS ENTERING LIFERAFT. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO UKMRCC, PHONE: 4413 2631 7575,
FAX: 4413 2631 8342,
E-MAIL: FALMOUTHCOASTGUARD@MCGA.GOV.UK.
